00049 
00050 #define XNTBRUN  0x00000001     /* Time base is running. */
00051 #define XNTBSET  0x00000002     /* Time set in time base. */
00052 #define XNTBLCK  0x00000004     /* Time base is locked. */
00053 
00054 typedef struct xntbase {
00055 
00056         struct xntbops *ops;    
00058         xnticks_t jiffies;      
00060         void (*hook)(void);     
00062         xnticks_t wallclock_offset; 
00064         u_long tickvalue;       
00066         u_long ticks2sec;       
00068         u_long status;          
00070         const char *name;       /* !< Name of time base. */
00071 
00072         xnholder_t link;
00073 
00074 #define link2tbase(ln)          container_of(ln, xntbase_t, link)
00075 
00076 } xntbase_t;

00078 #define xntbase_timeset_p(base) (!!testbits((base)->status,XNTBSET))

00088 static inline u_long xntbase_get_ticks2sec(xntbase_t *base)
00089 {
00090         return base->ticks2sec;

00093 static inline u_long xntbase_get_tickval(xntbase_t *base)
00094 {
00095         /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00096         return base->tickvalue;
00097 }

00104 static inline int xntbase_enabled_p(xntbase_t *base)
00105 {
00106         return !!(base->status & XNTBRUN);
00107 }

00114 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00115 
00116 static inline xntime_t xntbase_ticks2ns(xntbase_t *base, xnticks_t ticks)
00117 {
00118         /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00119         return ticks * xntbase_get_tickval(base);
00120 }
00121 
00122 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_ns2ticks(xntbase_t *base, xntime_t t)
00123 {
00124         return xnarch_ulldiv(t, xntbase_get_tickval(base), NULL);
00125 }
00126 
00127 static inline int xntbase_master_p(xntbase_t *base)
00128 {
00129         return base == &nktbase;
00130 }
00131 
00157 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_convert(xntbase_t *srcbase, xnticks_t ticks, xntbase_t *dstbase)
00158 {
00159         /* Twisted, but tries hard not to rescale to nanoseconds *
00160          before converting, so that we could save a 64bit multiply in
00161          the common cases (i.e. converting to/from master). */
00162 
00163         if (dstbase->tickvalue == srcbase->tickvalue)
00164                 return ticks;
00165 
00166         if (likely(xntbase_master_p(dstbase)))
00167                 return xntbase_ticks2ns(srcbase, ticks); /* Periodic to master base. */
00168 
00169         if (xntbase_master_p(srcbase))
00170                 return xntbase_ns2ticks(dstbase, ticks); /* Master base to periodic. */
00171 
00172         /* Periodic to periodic. */
00173 
00174         return xntbase_ns2ticks(dstbase, xntbase_ticks2ns(srcbase, ticks));
00175 }
00176 
00177 static inline int xntbase_periodic_p(xntbase_t *base)
00178 {
00179         return !xntbase_master_p(base);
00180 }
00181 
00182 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_get_jiffies(xntbase_t *base)
00183 {
00184         return xntbase_periodic_p(base) ? base->jiffies : xnarch_get_cpu_time();
00185 }
00186 
00187 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_get_rawclock(xntbase_t *base)
00188 {
00189         return xntbase_periodic_p(base) ? base->jiffies : xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00190 }

00312 static inline xnticks_t xntbase_get_time(xntbase_t *base)
00313 {
00314         /* Return an adjusted value of the monotonic time with the
00315            wallclock offset as defined in xntbase_set_time(). */
00316         return xntbase_get_jiffies(base) + base->wallclock_offset;
00317 }

00320                       xnticks_t newtime);

00329 static inline void xntbase_mount(void)
00330 {
00331         inith(&nktbase.link);
00332         appendq(&nktimebaseq, &nktbase.link);
00333 }
00334 
00335 static inline void xntbase_umount(void)
00336 {
00337         removeq(&nktimebaseq, &nktbase.link);
00338 }
